attributes.action: Get rid of the Edexcel/Pearson exam board due to the lack of professionalism.
attributes.background: This year all three papers have been leaked, this being the third consecutive year. The papers were so much harder than was previously shown. This has been detrimental for the student. They should not be an exam board. any other subjects have been affected in the past due to Edexcel’s incompetence

rejection.details:
Ofqual is responsible for investigating leaks of examination papers. Ofqual is the Office of Qualifications and Examinations Regulations that regulates qualifications, examinations and assessments in England. It is a non-ministerial department and independent.

You can find out moe about Ofqual here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ofqual
